data.message:
Hey slim !
Where have you been !
How r u  
Hope u r doing fine !
I was tellin my friend that u r the best out there with ur rhymes !
all the other rappers are penny !  
and u slim u r a dime 💎 !
hey shady
My mom old lady !
she worries a lot !
coz i hear u all night long !
i tell her i can listen u 24×7 !
coz i'am robbin and u r Raven !
a guy told me in "my band" u sucked !
i beat the crap out out of him !
Coz he was talking shit about u slim!  
I couldn't stand a at those guys ! 
Who think u r not good am
i'am like these are all lies!
7:7:2017 its SpiderMan homecoming! 
but right now i am running! 
from my responsibilities! , to study 
And complete all my duties!
i feel like shit! 
Coz i failed in exam of Neet!
but slim then i listen to guts over fear! 
and i feel success is somewhere near!
my friend said a celeb is comming to India.
I was like who! who! who? !
thought it was u! 
He was talking about chainsmokers  man!
And i told him i don't give dammn !
Coz i'am a STAN!
told u about that guy who said u sucked !
His father talked to my father now i am fucked!
When is ur next album commin out!
Bet u'll beat everyone out!
Leave them stunned! 
Like they are knifes which are blunt!
They are saying despacito is best!
When u will return u will fuck the rest!
when people don't appreciate ur art!
I feel their favourite perfume must be fart!
And they  don't know what really is art!
if u see this man hit a like!
Let me know u have seen it alright! 
Hope u get this man!
Wish to chat!
Ur biggest fan! 
This is STAN!
